Stage: Do the Mannequin Challenge and send the video in the group chat!
Gallery: Do something wild, unexpected, or one-of-a-kind! The most impressive act will win an extra reward!
Summit: Take a selfie with a stranger!
Aviary: Find a stranger to ask for the funniest Cypriot word they can think of, then record yourselves saying it together.
Sanctuary: Take a video saying the complete clue!
